availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. H. Lowry (Todd County, Kentucky, attorney and politician)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Admitted to the bar in 1857. Attorney in 1863. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Todd County from 1863 to 1865.

bibl.p: H. Charles Ulman, Lawyersâ€™ Record and Official Register of the United States (New York: A. S. Barnes and Co., 1972), p. 538; Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, History of Kentucky, Volume II (Covington, KY: Collins and Company, 1878), p. 728.
